issue.title: [CI][R][Docs] Timeout by man/to_duckdb.Rd processing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14896](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14896). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://lists.apache.org/thread/chtv79c2vqhwnlvh8rhn2kbkd8pmxlf5

> - test-ubuntu-default-docs:
>   URL: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2021-11-28-0-azure-test-ubuntu-default-docs

https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=16335&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181&l=21162

```

2021-11-28T07:10:38.4971115Z Reading 'man/to_arrow.Rd'
2021-11-28T07:10:39.0176541Z Writing 'reference/to_arrow.html'
2021-11-28T07:10:39.0188924Z Reading 'man/to_duckdb.Rd'
2021-11-28T12:04:21.2680962Z ##[error]The operation was canceled.
```

FYI: You can see timestamp by "Toggle timestamps" in the hamburger button located at the right of the "View row log" button.

cc: `[~jonkeane]` `[~icook]`
